Welcome to SwSpotify’s documentation!¶

SwSpotify is a Python library to get the song and artist of the currently playing song from the Spotify application faster and without using the API. It works on Windows, Linux, macOS and even the Spotify Web Player!

Behold, the power of SwSpotify:

>>> spotify.song()
'Hello'
>>> spotify.artist()
'Adele'
>>> spotify.current()
('Hello', 'Adele')

User’s Guide¶

This part of the documentation, which is mostly prose, begins with some background information about SwSpotify, then focuses on step-by-step instructions for getting the most out of SwSpotify.
